mapper.insert: INSERT INTO console_account_tenant(account_id, user_id, tenant_id, create_user_id,modify_user_id) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{userId}, #{tenantId}, #{createUserId},#{modifyUserId})
mapper.select: SELECT cat.* FROM console_account_tenant cat left join console_account ca on ca.id = cat.account_id WHERE cat.user_id = #{userId} AND cat.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND cat.is_deleted = 0 AND ca.type = #{engineType}
